meanings.sent1: Don't be a muppet and forget your keys at home.
meanings.sent2: The new employee felt like a muppet during the training session.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally put salt instead of sugar in my coffee like a real muppet.
meanings.sent4: He tried to fix the leaky faucet but ended up flooding the kitchen like a muppet.
meanings.sent5: Being a muppet in the kitchen, she managed to burn toast in the toaster.

meanings.definition: A puppet character created by Jim Henson.
meanings.sent1: My favorite muppet from 'The Muppet Show' is Kermit the Frog.
meanings.sent2: Children love watching muppets sing and dance on TV.
meanings.sent3: The muppet on the show made everyone laugh with its silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: The muppet's performance on stage was so lifelike, it amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The colorful muppet characters always bring joy to the viewers.
